title: Archive lightface extended
content:
G'day people,

I have a copy of Archive Lightface extended and I can't figure out where I got it from and whether or not it's legit. I can't seem to get any font info on my home PC (no font managment). I'm wondering whether anyone knows if it has been bundled with any Adobe products / MS products in the past.  
cheers

--N
author: nicholasgross

comments.content:
You should contact them directly.  
I believe they bundled some of their fonts in the past with an issue of Computer Arts magazine.
Ah of course, that's where they're from. Thanks for the tip!
